text:
February 10, 1955
Miss Martha C. Howard
Secretary
The Fund for Adult Education
1444 Wentworth Avenue
Pasadena 5, California
Dear Miss Howard:
On behalf of the National Association of
Educational Broadcasters I acknowledge with sincere
thanks the permission of the Fund to expend the balance
of the grant for a consulting service in union and-
labor relations problems to June 30, 1956. It is our
understanding' that in all other respects the provisions
and terms of this grant will be the same as set forth
in your letter of April 16, 1954 to Mr. Ausmus.
Obviously, we shall be happy to provide you with
progress reports and an audited financial statement at
the end of our fiscal year.
Sincerely,
Frank E. Schooley
President
cc: Harry J. Skornia
